str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular

str2: Neuter of a presumed derivative of the base of semaino; an indication, especially ceremonially or supernaturally.
A cure, healing. From iaomai; curing.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Or neuter pleion, or pleon comparative of polus; more in quantity, number, or quality; also the major portion.
Forty. The decade of tessares; forty.
A year. Apparently a primary word; a year.
